SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.engine.elements

Class BaseElement<D extends Dim>

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.engine.elements.BaseElement<D>
Type Parameters:
D - The dimensional type of the space the element exists in
Direct Known Subclasses:
Button, Gif, Image, Label
public abstract class BaseElement<D extends Dim> extends Object
Abstract base class for all game elements. Provides common functionality for elements with spatial dimensions.
